Hello blank fragment
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
A year from now you may wish you had started today.
Look in the mirror. That’s your competition.
A feeble body weakens the mind.
Put all excuses aside and remember this: You are capable.
Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
Success is what comes after your stop making excuses.
The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.
Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!
No pain, no gain.
Pushups are a simple and effective bodyweight movement that can help increase strength in your upper body and core.
The pull-up is a closed-chain movement where the body is suspended by the hands and pulls up
Strength exercise in which the trainee lowers their hips from a standing position and then stands back up
Inner core exercise which helps reduce body fat and increase core strength
The dead bug is a bodyweight exercise that targets your abdominal muscles.
User jumps avoiding the incoming rope to increase stamina and it serves as warmup
Strength exercise of lower body done but using weights to improve legs,calf,thighs
Split jumps are a plyometric exercise that strengthen the glutes and leg muscles
Tree Pose is a balancing asana
Gentle backbend practiced from a face-down position that warms and strengthens the spine while opening the chest
The practice of pranayama involves breathing exercises and patterns.
This asana is a meditation on determination and perseverance, as well as commitment.
It is a strengthening and heat-building asana
